question:
You have decided to leave your current employment. 
Write a letter to your employer. In the letter: 
• explain why you are writing
 • explain why you have decided to leave the company
 • tell your employer what you plan to do after leaving your present employment.
text: I am writing this letter to provide my 14 days written notice of resignation.

In regard to the recent incident at work, I have decided to leave and find another profession. I have been interviewed by a few companies and I strongly believe that within two weeks I will be joining my new work.

For the last few ,weeks I have been through lots of mental and physical stress and recently I was told by my manager to do a task that was beyond my capabilities to perform and I ended up injuring myself. I got yelled at her and she blamed me for everything that happened on site. I have always tried my best to perform my 100% however, I believe that this position is not a perfect fit for me.

I have planned to join a work-from-home profession and as per the Interviewer I will be getting an offer in a couple of days, I am very excited about that and I feel that I will be keeping a good balance between personal and work-life.
It was a wonderful time working with you, looking forward to hearing from you.
